characters.name: Link
characters.description: The protagonist and hero of the game.

characters.name: Old Man
characters.description: An enigmatic figure who guides Link and provides him with the Paraglider.

characters.name: King Rhoam
characters.description: The deceased King of Hyrule, appearing as a spirit and revealing the history of the Calamity Ganon.

characters.name: Zelda
characters.description: The daughter of King Rhoam and the voice that guides Link. She possesses prophesied powers.

characters.name: Impa
characters.description: The wise Sheikah elder who provides guidance and information to Link.

characters.name: Mipha
characters.description: The Zora princess and one of the Champions who controlled a Divine Beast.

characters.name: Daruk
characters.description: The Goron warrior and one of the Champions who controlled a Divine Beast.

characters.name: Urbosa
characters.description: The Gerudo chief and one of the Champions who controlled a Divine Beast.

characters.name: Revali
characters.description: The Rito archer and one of the Champions who controlled a Divine Beast.

locations.name: Shrine of Resurrection
locations.description: The place where Link awakens from his slumber at the beginning of the game.

locations.name: Hyrule
locations.description: The ruined kingdom that Link must explore and save from the Calamity Ganon.

locations.name: Temple of Time
locations.description: The location where Link is instructed to meet King Rhoam.

locations.name: Hyrule Castle
locations.description: The castle where Calamity Ganon is sealed and Princess Zelda sacrifices herself.

items.name: Paraglider
items.description: A tool given to Link by the Old Man, allowing him to glide and access new areas.

items.name: Spirit Orbs
items.description: Orbs found within the Shrines that the Old Man seeks in exchange for the Paraglider.

items.name: Guardians
items.description: Ancient machines that were reactivated and turned against the people of Hyrule.

items.name: Divine Beasts
items.description: Mighty constructs controlled by the Champions to combat the Calamity Ganon.

plot_points.name: Calamity Ganon
plot_points.description: A great evil that rose up and laid waste to Hyrule Kingdom. Sealed within Hyrule Castle, it grows in power and threatens to break free.

plot_points.name: Shrines
plot_points.description: Sacred locations where Link must complete trials to obtain Spirit Orbs.

plot_points.name: Zora's Domain
plot_points.description: The home of the Zora people, ruled by Princess Mipha.

plot_points.name: Goron City
plot_points.description: The settlement of the Goron people, led by the warrior Daruk.

plot_points.name: Gerudo Town
plot_points.description: The vibrant city of the Gerudo, led by the chief Urbosa.

plot_points.name: Rito Village
plot_points.description: The village inhabited by the bird-like Rito, home to the archer Revali.
